file_insights.changes: Added three nested Pydantic schema classes with validation
key_additions: DocumentDefinition class with name, name_he, description, source, required fields
SpecificationDefinition class with field_type, options, unit, required fields
ChecklistItemDefinition class with name, name_he, requires_file fields
model_validator for SpecificationDefinition to enforce options field presence logic
field_validator decorators for sanitization across all classes

file_insights.purpose: Defines allowed commands and detected project stack
Tracks subtask progress (1 of 7 completed, 1 in progress)
Defines sandbox, permissions, and tool access policies
Prevent auto-generated files from being committed

patterns_discovered.description: Consistent use of name and name_he fields across all three schema classes for English and Hebrew support
Combination of Pydantic Field constraints (min_length, max_length) with custom sanitization validators
SpecificationDefinition uses model_validator to enforce conditional logic where options field existence depends on field_type value
Use of Literal type for restricted choice fields (source, field_type)
Three separate definition schemas designed as building blocks for larger equipment template structures

gotchas_discovered.detail: description field is optional but still requires sanitization when present; validator handles None gracefully
SpecificationDefinition enforces strict validation: options required only when field_type='select', error raised otherwise

gotchas_discovered.description: Unit field limited to 50 characters maximum, which may need adjustment for complex measurement units

gotchas_discovered.detail: options field is list[str] | None, allowing both missing and empty lists - validation logic distinguishes between these
